sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { db } from '../firebase'; import { collection, getDocs, doc, getDoc } from 'firebase/firestore'; function AdminDashboard() { const [stats, setStats] = useState({ totalStudents: 0, totalCandidates: 0, votesCast: 0, voterTurnout: 0, electionStatus: 'Inactive', positions: [] }); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); useEffect(() => { const fetchData = async () => { try { // Get total students const studentsCollection = collection(db, 'students'); const studentsSnapshot = await getDocs(studentsCollection); const totalStudents = studentsSnapshot.docs.length; // Get total candidates const candidatesCollection = collection(db, 'candidates'); const candidatesSnapshot = await getDocs(candidatesCollection); const totalCandidates = candidatesSnapshot.docs.length; // Get votes cast const votesCollection = collection(db, 'votes'); const votesSnapshot = await getDocs(votesCollection); const votesCast = votesSnapshot.docs.length; // Calculate voter turnout const voterTurnout = totalStudents > 0 ? ((votesCast / totalStudents) * 100).toFixed(1) : 0; // Get election status const settingsDoc = doc(db, 'settings', 'election'); const settingsSnapshot = await getDoc(settingsDoc); const electionStatus = settingsSnapshot.exists() ? settingsSnapshot.data().active ? 'Active' : 'Inactive' : 'Inactive'; // Get positions const positionsCollection = collection(db, 'positions'); const positionsSnapshot = await getDocs(positionsCollection); const positions = positionsSnapshot.docs.map(doc => ({ id: doc.id, ...doc.data() })); setStats({ totalStudents, totalCandidates, votesCast, voterTurnout, electionStatus, positions }); setLoading(false); } catch (error) { console.error("Error fetching dashboard data: ", error); setLoading(false); } }; fetchData(); }, []); return (
{/* Sidebar */}
{/* Logo */}

{/* Nav Links */}

) : ( <> {/* Stats Grid */}

{/* Votes Cast */}

{stats.voterTurnout}%

Voter Turnout

{/* Election Status and Recent Activity */}
{/* Election Status */}

Election Status

Election {stats.electionStatus}
Time Remaining: {stats.electionStatus === 'Active' ? '8 hours' : 'Not Started'}
{/* Recent Activity */}

Recent Activity

View All

No recent activity to display

{/* Positions Table */}

Election Positions

Manage
{stats.positions.length > 0 ? ( stats.positions.map((position) => ( )) ) : ( )}
Position Category Candidates Status Actions
{position.name}
{position.category}
{position.candidateCount || '0'} / {position.vacancies}
 {position.status || 'Active'} Edit
No positions found. Add positions from the Positions page.
)}
); } export default AdminDashboard;
